data.message: Never expected a new album since The last seemed like a goodbye... I'll wait for it to buy! Love is evil, spell it backwards i'll show ya.

replies.message:
NEW MUSIC!!! #2PAC*#EMINEM*#BADGUY TRIMURTI - HELLRAIZER PT II..... LISTEN @ 
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=4oiY_361oMs
+
DOWNLOAD THIS TRACK ON THIS NEW MIXTAPE FOR FREE @ http://old.hulkshare.com/qfgbn506xe68

If you haven't noticed ..Every album sounds like a goodbye.  Even The Eminem Show with Saying Goodbye To Hollywood.   He always teases the idea of quitting like a drug addict but he's addicted to the game.

I'm addicted
To the pain, the stress, the drama
I'm drawn in so I guess imma mess
Cursed and blessed
But this time imma
Ain't changing my mind
I'm climbing out this abyss
You screaming as I walk out that I'll be missed
But when you spoke of people who meant the most to you
You left me off your list

Fuck you hip-hop
I'm leaving you, my life sentence is served bitch

I love that about him.
Yeah. We can just hope his next album will be more back to the roots than shady xv. I mean the last album was barely an Eminem album.
But love spelled backwards is 'evol' :/
Saram Zafar thats why the lyrics are "Love is evol, spell it backwardz I'll show ya"
Yaar Jonathan last time i checked evol wasn't a word
Saram Zafar  eminem is just bending the word evil into evol
Saram Zafar tell that to Eminem.
Saram Zafar you don't get it, do you?
Yikes..... way to quote one of the corniest Eminem lines ever.
in which song was that line
its called word play
Saram Zafar finally someone agrees with me F$@k word play. If they wanna play with words it can be short for evolution.
Evol *
Fuck you stupid pricks!

What don't you get? 
"Love is evol"

Just say the word...
It's a play on the word evil, to show love is evil, not seen something so straight forward xd
Love si evol
" love is evil " -->> " love is live "??  Maybe?? Live to love?
Aloysius Majje 25 to life
How did you get good bye from that?? He literally says he's ready to battle everyone and ready to attack first
Marc Winther Dahl nah its space bound, Its my favourite
